name: Space Blocks (JaTYa)
description:
Space blocks is a space game set in a very blocky space. 

You, a block, must find your way through an infinite amount of randomly generated green blocks, as you make use of your block cannons to fire block bullets that will kill falling blocks, before they can kill you.

Controls: 

- A / D - Left / Right, 

- Up / Left / Right - Cannons
